bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names yue ou 噦嘔 , yue yue 啘噦 ; yue 啘 ; yue qi 噦氣 , retching qi; yue ni 噦逆 , retching with countermovement [of qi]. Illness Sign identical with gan ou 乾嘔 , dry vomiting. Shang han lun 傷寒論 194 ：陽明病，不能食， 攻其熱必噦 , “In the case of disease in the yang brilliance [section], if one is unable to eat, attacking the heat will cause retching ”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry pi pa ye 枇杷葉： 噦者，乾嘔有聲也 , “ Retching is dry vomiting with sounds”.
